Will you stop being a dick? What is your problem?
translation.zh: 你可以像个人吗?你有什么问题?

translation.en: Amanda wasn't weak, okay? She sacrificed herself for us!
translation.zh: 阿曼达不是弱,好吗?她为我们牺牲自己!

translation.en: Okay, well, then let's not waste that sacrifice by getting yourself killed.
translation.zh: 好,那么我们就要活下去别让她白白牺牲.

translation.en: This was my room.
Exactly the same.
This is my bed.
Me, too.
It's Amanda's.
IED blast.
She was the only survivor.
I was on a plane with my mom...
translation.zh: 我和妈妈在一架飞机里...

translation.en: backpacking across Vietnam.
The plane just crashed in the middle of the jungle.
It took them a week to find me.
translation.zh: 他们花了一星期才找到我.

translation.en: I remember that.
You were on the news.
My college roommate and I took a boat out...
translation.zh: 我的大学室友和我开船出海...

translation.en: and a wave came out of nowhere and just...
flipped the boat over.
And I tried to grab a line and, uh...
almost took my thumb off.
Wet...
freezing, just holding on to the hull...
with only one jacket between the two of us.
translation.zh: 我们两个人只有一间外套.

translation.en: And Nathan, he started getting aggressive and confused.
translation.zh: 内森他开始变得激动和困惑.

translation.en: It was signs of hypothermia, they told me later in the hospital.
translation.zh: 这是体温过低的迹象,这是过后医院告诉我的.

translation.en: Nathan, come back!
On the second day, he swam off.
I don't know what he thought he saw out there...
translation.zh: 我不知道他看到什么但是...

translation.en: but there was nothing but ocean.
The next day, the Coast Guard found me alone.
translation.zh: 第二天,海岸卫队... 发现我一个人.

translation.en: What about you?
I was the first of my friends to get a car.
translation.zh: 我是朋友当中第一有车的人.

translation.en: It was winter break and we were having this...
great night and...
I wanted to take everybody out on a joy ride.
I was wasted.
Me and 11 others were working a mine in West Virginia...
translation.zh: 我和另外11人 在西弗吉尼亚的一个矿产工作...

translation.en: including my little brother, Cal.
There was a cave-in. Occupational hazard.
translation.zh: 发生了洞穴倒塌.职业危险.

translation.en: Me and Cal got pinned right next to each other.
translation.zh: 我和卡尔被紧紧卡在一起...

translation.en: I couldn't see him, but I could, uh...
translation.zh: 我看不到他,但是我可以...

translation.en: I could hear him suffocating slowly.
translation.zh: 我可以听到他慢慢窒息.

translation.en: I heard him take his last breath.
translation.zh: 我听到他呼出最后一口气.

translation.en: By the time the rescue crew got there, I was the only one alive.
translation.zh: 当救援队伍来到,我是唯一生存的人.

translation.en: They knew everything about us...
every goddamn detail. I mean, they knew the jacket...
that my roommate was wearing on that boat.
translation.zh: 我室友在船上穿着的外套.

translation.en: "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer," that's the...
song that was playing when we crashed.
translation.zh: 我们出事时播着这首歌.

translation.en: They made these rooms for us.
translation.zh: 这些房是为我们量身打造的.

translation.en: They addressed the boxes from people that we trust.
translation.zh: 他们利用我们信任的人的名义来送那些盒子.

translation.en: My nephew texted me, "Have a good time."
translation.zh: 我的侄儿发短信给我说"祝你有个快乐时光".

translation.en: They hacked his goddamn phone. It's Danny's.
translation.zh: -他们骇入他的电话 -这是丹尼的.

translation.en: Carbon monoxide poisoning.
Everyone in his family was killed but him.
None of us died, right?
We're sole survivors. JASON: So what?
translation.zh: -我们是唯一生存者 -那又如何?

translation.en: We're a statistical improbability.
translation.zh: 统计上,我们是不可能生存的.

translation.en: And now they want to see who will be the luckiest among the lucky.
translation.zh: 现在他们要看我们谁是最幸运的.

translation.en: MAN [ON TV]: Do you have the heart to let Dr. Wootan Yu...
translation.zh: 你有没有心让宇沃潭博士...

translation.en: help you become a better you?
Open new doors by testing your limits.
translation.zh: 打开新门来测试你的极限.

translation.en: Don't settle for a humdrum existence.
translation.zh: 不要满足于单调乏味的生活.

translation.en: Live life to the extreme.
Place your order in the next five minutes and receive a complimentary getaway.
translation.zh: 在五分钟内下订就可获得免费旅游.

translation.en: MIKE: Okay, well, at least we know how much time we have.
translation.zh: 好,至少我们知道剩下多少时间.

translation.en: Yeah, knowing exactly when I'm going to die is a huge comfort.
translation.zh: 对,知道我什么时候死是一个很大的快慰.

translation.en: Do you guys not understand?
They chose us to die to see who's the last person standing.
translation.zh: 他们选择我们看谁能撑到最后.

translation.en: We need you on board right now, okay? Stay with us.
translation.zh: 我们现在需要你,好吗?专心点.

translation.en: We can't just keep playing by their rules.
translation.zh: 我们不能一直遵守他们的规则.

translation.en: What else are we supposed to do? They're watching us.
translation.zh: 我们还能怎样?他们在监视我们.

translation.en: They know every move that we're making.
translation.zh: 他们知道我们的一举一动.

translation.en: They're watching us.
I've got something.
Come on, come on.
I got it. Here, here.
Uh. Okay. What do we have?
A fist, one finger, and two fingers. It could be...
translation.zh: 一个拳头,一根手指和两根手指.这可能是...

translation.en: It could be zero, one, two, right? Right? Like a code.
translation.zh: 这可能是零,一,二,对吗?像一个密码.

translation.en: No, no, no. It spells...
E-K-G.
Yeah, it's sign language.
My cousin is deaf. They must have known about that, too.
translation.zh: 我的表弟是聋子.他们一定也知道这件事.

translation.en: Is there an EKG machine here somewhere?
Hey, what are you doing?
Quantum Zeno effect. Atoms won't change if you take continuous measurements...
translation.zh: 量子芝诺效应. 如果你连续测量,原子就不会改变...

translation.en: so as long as they're watching us, we can't change our state.
translation.zh: 所以只要他们一直监视我们, 我们就不能改变现状.

translation.en: The game is designed so they always win.
translation.zh: 游戏的设计是让他们赢.

translation.en: Okay, okay. We could really use your help right now.
translation.zh: 好.我们现在真的很需要你的帮忙.

translation.en: No. We can find another way out. JASON: We don't even know the first way out.
translation.zh: -不.我们可以找另一条出路 -我们连第一出路都不知道.

translation.en: Just stop smashing shit and take a deep breath.
MAN [ON TV]: Do you have the heart to let Dr. Wootan Yu
translation.zh: 停止砸东西和深呼吸. 你有没有心让宇沃潭博士 帮助你成为更好的你吗?

translation.en: help you become a better you?
translation.zh: 你有没有心让宇沃潭博士 帮助你成为更好的你吗?

translation.en: BEN: Hey, Zoey, you need to calm down.
In three minutes, they're going to poison us.
translation.zh: 三分钟内,他们将会对我们下毒.

translation.en: We are running out of time here. You've got to calm down.
translation.zh: 我们没时间了.你必须冷静.

translation.en: Stop telling me to calm down, okay? You're not listening to me!
translation.zh: 别再叫我冷静,好吗?你没听我说.

translation.en: You guys, it's an EKG machine. Maybe this is our way out.
translation.zh: 各位,这里有一台EKG机器. 也许这是我们的出路.

translation.en: Ben, take your shirt off. What? Why me?
translation.zh: -本,脱掉你的衣服 -什么?为什么是我?

translation.en: Because it's the next clue, that's why. Come on, it's just an EKG machine.
translation.zh: 因为这是下一个提示.快,只是一台EKG机器.

translation.en: No, no. Nothing is just anything in this hellhole.
translation.zh: 不.这里没有一样东西是没用的.

translation.en: JASON: The right heart rate could open a door, Ben.
translation.zh: 正确的心跳可以打开门,本.

translation.en: We're running out of time. Hurry up.
Just do it. Come on.
Come on. Hold those, hold those. Take a breath, take a breath.
JASON: Your heart rate's too low. Your heart rate's too low.
It's not working.
Somebody else has to do it.
Mike, we need a higher rate. You've got to go.
translation.zh: 迈克,我们需要更快的心跳.轮到你.

translation.en: What? I'm not your guinea pig, man. You do it. You try it.
translation.zh: 什么?我不是白老鼠.你来做.你试.

translation.en: Look. Ben is fine, man. Come on, I'll go next. We need a higher rate. Come on.
translation.zh: 看,本没事.快,我下一个. 我们需要更快的心跳.

translation.en: All right. Okay. All right, let's do it.
Zoey, please, just listen to me for two seconds.
We're in a metal box. Come on, that's not going to help.
translation.zh: 我们在一个铁盒里.拜托,这没帮助.

translation.en: Just stop smashing shit and help me.
JASON: Higher, higher, higher. Come on!
[BEEPS] No.
MAN: Open new doors by testing your limits.
translation.zh: 打开新门测试你的极限.

translation.en: Testing your limits. Testing your limits. We need a higher rate. You're kidding me.
translation.zh: 测试你的极限.我们需要更快的心跳.

translation.en: Man, I'm already freaking out here. My heart rate's sky high.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑.我已经快吓死了.我的心跳很快了.

translation.en: Want me to do some burpees, jumping jacks? What do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 你要我做些运动吗?你要我做什么?

translation.en: We've got these. What are you, insane?
When the Coast Guard found me dying from hypothermia...
translation.zh: 当海岸卫队发现我快死于体温过低...

translation.en: my heart was half dead, man. These are what they used to bring me back.
translation.zh: 我的心已经半死了.这些是他们救活我的东西.

translation.en: Come on, this is what they used. No, no. That is not an option.
translation.zh: -拜托,这是他们用的 -不.这不是一个选择.

translation.en: Listen, it is a clue. They put it in my room because they knew I would know, Mike.
translation.zh: 这是一个提示.他们把它放在我房间 因为他们知道我懂,迈克.

translation.en: Your heart's already high. Man up, come on.
translation.zh: 你的心跳已经很快了.勇敢些,来吧.

translation.en: Are you kidding me? Get these away from me.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吗?把它们拿走.

translation.en: Look at me, goddamn it! Look at me!
In one minute, they're about to poison us.
translation.zh: 一分钟内,他们将对我们下毒.

translation.en: And we are going to suffocate, all right?
We're going to run out of breathable air, just like you did in that mine.
translation.zh: 我们将缺乏空气,就像你在矿里.

translation.en: Shit. You think about your brother, Cal.
Cal was his name, right? This is your time.
translation.zh: 卡尔是他的名字,对吗?现在是你的时刻.

translation.en: Mike, you can save us.
This is it. You could save us, Mike.
translation.zh: 就是这样.你可以救我们,迈克.

translation.en: Now, save us. Okay.
Do it. Do it, do it quick! Come on, do it!
BEN: Jason, what are you doing? That's it.
BEN: No. No.
Hey, don't. Stop! Get off me!
You're going to kill him!
[BEEPING] Come on!
Mike? What did you do?
He stopped breathing! Mike!
Wake up! Mike. Hey, stop! Stop!
Come on!
Come on, Mike!
MAN: Open new doors by testing your limits.
translation.zh: 打开新门测试你的极限.

translation.en: Testing your limits.
High and low. High and low.
One, two. Goddamn it. Fuck!
I don't actually know how to do this.
What the hell are you doing?
Extremes. Maybe they mean the low end.
Hey, come on.
BEN: Come on, man.
Come on. Shit.
Mike.
Mike.
The door. The door is opening. It opened.
BEN: Zoey. Hey!
Zoey!
Zoey! Hey, come on. There's a way out. This is the way out.
translation.zh: -佐伊!嘿,快来.有出路了 -这就是出路.

translation.en: You'll suffocate, come on! Just go!
BEN: Please! Just go!
We should have made her come with us.
translation.zh: 我们应该逼她跟我们走.

translation.en: We just left her there to die.
She made her decision. What the hell is wrong with you?
translation.zh: -她自己做的决定 -你到底怎么回事?

translation.en: What happened back there? I saved our asses. You're welcome.
translation.zh: -刚才发生什么事? -我救了你命.不客气.

translation.en: You killed Mike.
Sitting on his ass 12 hours a day killed him.
translation.zh: 是他一天坐12小时害死他.

translation.en: If it wasn't that room, it would've been the next.
translation.zh: 如果不是那间房,他就不会死.

translation.en: So that's just something you do, isn't it? Your friend on the boat?
translation.zh: 这就是你所做的,对吗?你在船上的朋友?

translation.en: What are you saying, Ben? Huh?
Use your words.
One jacket between the two of you.
Give me your jacket!
It's pretty convenient that he just swam off and died.
translation.zh: 说他游出去死了是一个方便的借口.

translation.en: You don't want to do this, man.
You being the sole survivor had nothing to do with luck.
translation.zh: 你成为唯一幸存者跟运气没关系.

translation.en: Admit it.
You killed him! Admit that you killed your friend.
translation.zh: 你杀了他!承认你杀了你的朋友.

translation.en: Surviving is a choice!
Make yours. [WHIMPERING]
Keep your eyes open and look for clues.
translation.zh: 张开你的眼睛寻找提示.

translation.en: Hey, it's a hatch.
I guess we just open it.
What are we letting in?
Fine, I'll do it.
[GRUNTS] It's heavy. Come on, try harder.
Asshole, I don't go to the gym every day.
Come on, come on.
What's this shit on my hands?
I don't feel so good.
[DISTORTED] Hey, hey.
They put something on the handle.
translation.zh: 他们涂了一些东西在把手.

translation.en: Hey, you're melting. You're melting.
[DISTORTED] What? You're melting.
What? Wait. Look, look. It says something.
translation.zh: 什么?等一等.看.这里写着一些东西.

translation.en: "Feel free to leave, but may we note...
translation.zh: "可以随意离开,但我们要提醒你...

translation.en: it's best to find the antidote."
How the hell are we supposed to do that?
Get up and look, goddamn it!
Who cares, man? We're going to die here anyway.
translation.zh: 谁在乎?我们反正都会死.

translation.en: I'm not going to die. I'm not going to die.
Okay.
Where is it? Come on. Come on. Where is it?
Where is this bastard? Where is it?
JASON: Ben. Ben.
I have the anti-- Give me that!
BEN: It's mine!
Okay, I've got ten numbers, four spots.
translation.zh: 好,我有十个号码,四个地方.

translation.en: I need a four-digit code.
translation.zh: 我需要四个数字的密码.

translation.en: MAN: Entering room five. Stand by.
WOMAN [OVER RADIO]: Standing by.
MAN: We have two bodies. Over.
translation.zh: 我们发现两具尸体.报告

translation.en: WOMAN: Copy.
20 minutes for disposal and cleanup. Over.
MAN: Copy. Out.
MAN: Look at that, the oxygen mask.
What the hell was she going to do with that?
Breathe, bitch!
MAN [OVER SPEAKERS]: Now, you were a dark horse.
My money was on Jason.
translation.zh: 我的钱都押在杰森身上.

translation.en: But, see, that's why these games are so fascinating.
translation.zh: 但是这就是这游戏吸引之处.

translation.en: Somehow, after being burnt, frozen, poisoned, and crippled...
translation.zh: 不知何故,经过了燃烧,冰冻,中毒和致残...

translation.en: you still managed to escape the final room.
translation.zh: 你还能逃出最后一间房.

translation.en: Did you ever think you had that in you?
translation.zh: 你是否有想过你真的有这个本事吗?

translation.en: That adrenaline, that drive?
translation.zh: 那肾上腺素,是那个原因吗?

translation.en: Sit down. Celebrate.
You won something for once.
So, you're the psycho that designed this murder maze, huh?
translation.zh: 你就是设计这杀人迷宫的疯子吗?

translation.en: No, I'm the Games Master.
The Puzzle Maker designs the rooms.
translation.zh: 谜团设计师设计这些房间.

translation.en: But you kill people for fun. There's nothing good left on TV?
translation.zh: 但是你杀人为乐.电视里没有好节目了吗?

translation.en: You killed all your friends...
because you didn't want to pay for a goddamn cab.
I wouldn't get too comfortable on that high horse, Ben.
From the beginning of civilization... we've known there was something captivating...
translation.zh: 从文明开始,我们就知道...

translation.en: about watching human beings fight for their lives.
translation.zh: 看人为生命战斗是一件吸引人的事.

translation.en: That's why we watch gladiator games, public executions...
translation.zh: 所以我们看格斗士比赛,公开行刑...

translation.en: rubber-necking on the freeway.
But now the world's gone soft. Everything is safe. Everything is careful.
translation.zh: 但是现在世界变软弱了. 一切都很安全.一切都很小心.

translation.en: So, we created a sport for people who still have a thirst for savagery...
translation.zh: 所以我们创造了一个运动 给那些还渴望野性的人...

translation.en: and we provided them with a box seat for life's ultimate drama.
translation.zh: 我们提供他们一个包厢观赏人生终极戏剧.

translation.en: Our customers are some of the most powerful people in the world.
translation.zh: 我们的顾客是世上很有权威的人但是...

translation.en: But every year, they demand more.
translation.zh: 每一年,他们的要求越来越高.

translation.en: More complicated rooms.
More interesting subjects.
More ways to gamble on life and death.
translation.zh: 更多的方式来打赌生死.

translation.en: Last year, they had college athletes...
the year before, savants...
and this year we had lone survivors.
They wanted to know if luck had anything to do with it.
translation.zh: 他们想知道是不是运气的问题.

translation.en: Lucky people don't get kidnapped and tortured by psychopaths.
translation.zh: 幸运者不会被精神病人绑架和折磨.

translation.en: You know, it's kind of hurtful when you call someone a psychopath, huh?
translation.zh: 你知道吗,当一个人被称为疯子 是一件痛心的事.

translation.en: I thought it was stupid, too.
But here you are...
our lowest-odds ever to win...
still alive.
I really didn't think it was possible...
translation.zh: 我真的觉得这是不可能的...

translation.en: but as I said...
you were the long shot.
[STAMMERING] So I won.
That means I get to go home, right?
translation.zh: 这表示我可以回家了,对吗?

translation.en: Ben...
at the end of the Kentucky Derby...
do you think the horse gets a prize?
translation.zh: 你认为马匹获得奖金吗?

translation.en: Hey. Hey, Ben.
Come on. Hey, Ben, come on. Come on.
Ben.
Ben.
Ben, come on, get up. Ben, come on, get up.
No!
You can't leave until we finish our game, Zoey.
translation.zh: 你不能离开直到我们完成我们的游戏,佐伊.

translation.en: Okay, we have to make sure that--
He's dead.
Okay. Come on. Come on.
Come on, there's a service elevator.
translation.zh: 来,那里有一个服务电梯.

translation.en: You came back for me.
Yeah, well, I'm tired of being the only survivor.
translation.zh: 是的,我厌倦了成为唯一生还者.

translation.en: BEN: Zoey, go, go. ZOEY: Okay.
NURSE: It's been 24 hours. He's stable now. You should get some rest.
translation.zh: 已经24小时了.他稳定了.你应该去休息.

translation.en: WOMAN [IN DISTANCE]: He's ready.
MAN [ON PA]: Dr. Bell, please come to the OR. Dr. Bell, OR, please.
Miss Davis?
Are you feeling well enough to come with me?
translation.zh: 你有能力跟我们走一趟吗?

translation.en: OFFICER: All right, everyone, 360.
DETECTIVE: Miss Davis.
Wait, this was the waiting room. Okay?
translation.zh: 等一等,这里曾经是等候室.好吗?

translation.en: And then it turned into a giant oven, okay?
translation.zh: 然后它变成一个巨大烤箱,好吗?

translation.en: And there was fire. The fire came down from the ceiling.
translation.zh: 然后有火.火从天花板喷下来.

translation.en: We haven't found any evidence of the things you've described.
translation.zh: 我们没找到你所描述的证据.

translation.en: That. Look. This was the duct.
There was a painting that came down.
Have you ever seen things that weren't there before?
translation.zh: 你有看过没在那里的东西吗?

translation.en: I am not imagining this, okay?
translation.zh: 我不是幻想出来的,好吗?

translation.en: Look, Ben was there, too.
He'll tell you all this when he wakes up.
translation.zh: 他会告诉你一切当他醒来后.

translation.en: DETECTIVE: Right. Your friend, Ben Miller?
We got a report from the hospital.
translation.zh: 我们从医院拿到一份报告.

translation.en: They found traces of three different illegal substances in his bloodstream.
translation.zh: 他们在他的血液中 发现了三种不同的非法物质.

translation.en: "No way out."
DETECTIVE: Miss Davis. It's an anagram.
AMANDA: Dr. Wootan Yu.
translation.zh: -戴维斯小姐 -这是一个字谜. 宇沃潭博士

translation.en: MAN [ON TV]: Do you have the heart to let Dr. Wootan Yu help you--
translation.zh: 你是否有勇气让宇沃潭医生帮你...

translation.en: No way out. Wootan Yu.
"Wootan Yu" is "No way out." DETECTIVE: Miss Davis.
No way out, Wootan Yu.
This. Look. That was a part of the game.
translation.zh: 这个.看.这是游戏的一部分.

translation.en: This is part of the game!
We've got to vacate the premises.
Wootan Yu. Wootan Yu.
Thank you.
So, are you going to tell me what's going on?
translation.zh: 你要告诉我发生什么事吗?

translation.en: I am the new regional sales rep for all of Logan Square.
translation.zh: 我是洛根广场的新区域销售代表.

translation.en: I'm officially client facing. It's for vegan dog food...
translation.zh: 我正式面对客人.卖素狗粮...

translation.en: but, you know, you've got to start somewhere.
translation.zh: 但是,你必须从某处开始.

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
Is that homework?
What is this?
Mike Nolan died of a heart attack in a bathroom in Union Station.
translation.zh: 迈克诺兰在工会卫浴室死于心脏病发作.

translation.en: Jason Walker was thrown from his bike on the I-64...
translation.zh: 杰森沃克在i-64公路上从自行车上摔了下来.

translation.en: DMT found in his system.
Danny Khan drowns in Lake Michigan.
translation.zh: 丹尼汗在密歇根湖溺毙.

translation.en: Amanda Harper, rock-climbing alone, because that makes sense...
translation.zh: 阿曼达,独自攀岩,因为这很合理...

translation.en: falls and dies.
There would have been articles for us, too.
translation.zh: 我们两个肯定也有新闻.

translation.en: You've got to let this shit go.
I can't just pretend that they never existed.
translation.zh: 我不能假装这件事不曾发生.

translation.en: Everyone else who was sent those invitations died...
translation.zh: 所有被邀请的人都死了...

translation.en: and whoever sent them is still out there.
translation.zh: 而邀请我们的人还活着.

translation.en: Don't you want answers? We can find them.
translation.zh: 你不想知道答案吗?我们可以找到他们.

translation.en: They rigged the game so that we would lose and we won.
translation.zh: 他们设计我们会输的游戏,但是我们却赢了.

translation.en: We beat them at their own game.
I didn't have a lot to go on, but...
the logo...
it's an impossible object.
translation.zh: 这是一个不可能的物体.

translation.en: It's an Escher staircase that turns in on itself.
translation.zh: 这是一个自己转动的艾舍尔楼梯.

translation.en: It's totally unique.
The numbers are in a pattern on the staircase.
translation.zh: 数字在楼梯上的图案里.

translation.en: 23, 22 in a repeated sequence of right angles.
They're coordinates...
for an unlisted industrial building in the middle of Manhattan.
translation.zh: 曼哈顿中部一个未记录的工业建筑的坐标.

translation.en: They're hiding in plain sight. What are we supposed to do with that?
translation.zh: -他们隐匿在眼前 -我们要怎么做?

translation.en: I bought us plane tickets. Plane tickets?
Two weeks, I'm going.
Zoey, it's called "survivor's guilt."
translation.zh: 佐伊,这叫做"幸存者的负罪感".

translation.en: My therapist says that in order to live, you need to move on.
translation.zh: 我的治疗师说为了活下去,你必须忘记过去.

translation.en: Moving on doesn't mean running.
And I'm done running. Are you in?
translation.zh: 我不再逃避了.你加入吗?

translation.en: All right.
Yeah, I'm in. Let's do it.
You're not Jason Bourne, though.
Okay? Mm-hmm.
Come on. It's got to be in here.
Found it! X marks the spot.
Come on, come on, where is it?
This has to be it, right? I've got the tool!
translation.zh: 一定是这个,对吗?我找到工具了!

translation.en: Right here. It must connect to the bolt we found.
translation.zh: 这里.它一定跟我找到的螺栓连接在一起.

translation.en: Okay. Try it on the door. See if it'll turn.
You can do it.
Anything? It's not going!
See if you can turn it. It's not working!
Try clockwise. Clockwise?
Yeah, clockwise! Okay.
Something happened here. What?
translation.zh: -等一等,有些东西发生了 -什么?

translation.en: COMPUTER: Terrain, terrain. What's this?
No, it's another riddle. "I fly without wings, I cry without eyes."
translation.zh: 不,另一个谜语."无翼能飞,无眼能哭".

translation.en: What does that mean? I don't know. Give me a second!
translation.zh: -什么意思? -我不知道.给我一些时间!

translation.en: Heads down!
Brace for impact!
Wait, "cloud"! Try "cloud"! "Cloud"?
Yeah, "cloud." Okay.
Try the door! Come on, let's go!
COMPUTER: Pull up. Caution, terrain. Decision height. Terrain, terrain. Pull up.
translation.zh: 升上去.小心,地面.决定高度.地面.升上去.

translation.en: No, no! Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 升上去.小心,地面.决定高度.地面.升上去. -快点! -小心,地面.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Caution, terrain. Terrain, terrain.
Do something! COMPUTER: Pull up. Decision height. Pull up.
translation.zh: -快想办法! -升上去.决定高度.升上去.

translation.en: Ending sim. Do you want to reset?
PUZZLE MAKER [DISTORTED VOICE]: No. Good work. We're ready for game time.
translation.zh: 不.做得好.我们准备好开始游戏了.

translation.en: I hurt my goddamn hand on that bolt again, Larry.
translation.zh: 我又被被那螺栓弄伤手了,拉里.

translation.en: WOMAN [OVER SPEAKER]: Deboard the simulator.
[DISTORTED] What's the probability of survival? It's approximately four percent.
translation.zh: -生存几率多少? -大概百分之四.

translation.en: PUZZLE MAKER: Well, it's not a game if she doesn't stand any chance.
translation.zh: 这不是游戏如果她没机会获胜.

translation.en: We've intercepted her flight information. It's on.
translation.zh: 我们截获他们的班机资料.开始了.

translation.en: I'm so glad Zoey got over her fear of flying.
translation.zh: 我很高兴佐伊终于克服飞行.

translation.en: Let's play again.
